sheep.input
Interface TouchListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Container, GameThread, State, TextButton, Widget
public interface TouchListener

Objects can subscribe to touch events by implementing this interface.

Method Summary
 boolean onTouchDown(android.view.MotionEvent event)
          Called when the user touches down on the screen.
 boolean onTouchMove(android.view.MotionEvent event)
          Called when the user drags a touch along the screen.
 boolean onTouchUp(android.view.MotionEvent event)
          Called when the user releases a touch from the screen.
 

Method Detail

onTouchDown

boolean onTouchDown(android.view.MotionEvent event)
Called when the user touches down on the screen.

Parameters:
event - The event generated by the action.
Returns:
True if the event was consumed, false otherwise.

onTouchUp

boolean onTouchUp(android.view.MotionEvent event)
Called when the user releases a touch from the screen.

Parameters:
event - The event generated by the action.
Returns:
True if consumed, false otherwise.

onTouchMove

boolean onTouchMove(android.view.MotionEvent event)
Called when the user drags a touch along the screen.

Parameters:
event - The event generated by the action.
Returns:
True if consumed, false otherwise.
